document_data.caption: A map showing Fasruil in northeastern Luiren.
document_data.name: Fasruil
document_data.mainbody: '''Fasruil''' or '''Fasriul''' was the northernmost city in [[Luiren]]. It was famous for the tasty red [[rhubarb]] that was traded across all of Luiren and other countries of the [[Shining South]].
document_data.Geography: Fasruil sat along the southern rim of the [[Long Forest]] near the eastern border of Luiren. Much of the farmland surrounding this portion of the forest was considered the best in the whole country.
document_data.Inhabitants:
Some 3,000 [[halfling]]s called Fasruil home. Most of these halflings made their living through farming or baking.

[[Silari Carver]] was the mayor of Fasruil in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Activities: As of 1367, Fasruil was a quickly growing city because of increased trading with both [[Durpar]] and [[Halruaa]].
document_data.Armed Forces: A collection of forty [[warders]] patrolled the forest near the city.
